title: Insurance Code
context: [PART II.] LIMITED LINES MOTOR VEHICLE RENTAL COMPANY PRODUCER [ยง431:9A-141] Definitions. Unless specified otherwise, the following definitions shall be used in this part in addition to other definitions in chapter 431: &ldquo;Limited lines motor vehicle rental company producer&rdquo; or &ldquo;rental company producer&rdquo; means a motor vehicle rental company that is licensed by the commissioner to solicit and sell insurance coverages only in connection with and which are incidental to the rental company&rsquo;s business of renting motor vehicles. &ldquo;Motor vehicle rental agreement&rdquo; or &ldquo;rental agreement&rdquo; means any written agreement setting forth the terms and conditions governing the use of a motor vehicle that is rented or leased from a rental company. &ldquo;Motor vehicle rental company&rdquo; or &ldquo;rental company&rdquo; means any person that is primarily in the business of providing motor vehicles to the public under a motor vehicle rental agreement for a rental period not to exceed ninety days. &ldquo;Motor vehicle renter&rdquo; means any person obtaining the use of a vehicle from a rental company under the terms of a rental agreement for a rental period not to exceed ninety days. &ldquo;Rental vehicle&rdquo; or &ldquo;vehicle&rdquo; means a motor vehicle: (1) Of the private passenger type including passenger vans, minivans, and sport utility vehicles; or (2) Of the cargo type, including cargo vans or pickup trucks with a gross vehicle weight of less than twenty-six thousand pounds, that do not require a commercial driver&rsquo;s license for the operation of the vehicle. [L 2002, c 235, pt of ยง1]
